Nicolaos Panagiotopoulos, onye a maara nke ọma dị ka Nico Panagio, bụ onye na-eme ihe ngosi telivishọn mba South Afrka, onye na-ememe ihe nkiri, na onye ọchụnta ego a maara maka ịbụ onye na-elekọta Survivor South Afrika kemgbe afọ 2010
A makwaara ya maka ọrụ mbụ ya na ihe nkiri ncha 7de Laan na dị ka onye ngosi na Top Billing
A mụrụ Panagio na Pretoria n'aka nna onye Gris si Elis ma gaa Pretoria Boys High School. Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Method Actor's Training Centre, ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ obere ọrụ na Egoli na Generations
Nke a bu ụzọ mee nkwekọrịta ya na 7de Laan, ebe ọ na-eme onye ọchụnta ego George Kyriakis
Ọ sonyeere Top Billing dị ka onye na-eme ihe ngosi n'onwe ya na afo 2007 mgbe ọ hapụsịrị 7de Laan ma kemgbe ahụ na-egwuri egwu na mpaghara 14, Ella Blue na Vallei van Sluiers
Ọ na-akwado usoro ihe omume M-Net Survivor South Afrika kemgbe oge nke atọ ya na afọ 2009.
O meela ihe nkiri dị iche iche, gụnyere Susanna van Biljon, Semi-Soet, Konfetti na Vrou Soek Boer
A họpụtara Panagio maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na afọ 2012 SAFTAs maka ọrụ ya na Semi-Soet
Ọ bụ onye nwe ụlọ ọrụ Trade Revolution (Pty) Ltd., ọ bụkwa onyeisi oche nke otu na-enweghị uru Missing Children SA.
